This scene was assembled using mostly library assets that were optimised and made game engine ready. Materials were created using Substance Suite.[/vc_project_detail_parallax_items][vc_project_detail_parallax_items image=”1331″][/vc_project_detail_parallax_items][vc_project_detail_parallax_items image=”1328″ style=”light” position_light=”right” subtitle=”WORK DONE:”]

  • environment design
  • modelling
  • texturing/materials
  • set dressing

[/vc_project_detail_parallax_items][vc_project_detail_parallax_items image=”1327″][/vc_project_detail_parallax_items][vc_project_detail_parallax_items image=”1329″ style=”light” position_light=”left” subtitle=”TOOLS USED:”]

  •  Autodesk 3ds Max
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • UV Layout
  • Substance Painter
  • Substance Designer
  • Bitmap2Material
  • Unreal Engine 1
